verses.verse: Give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh,<WH3068> for he is good,<WH2896> for his loving kindness<WH2896> endures forever.<WH5769>
Let Israel<WH3478> now say<WH559> that his loving kindness<WH2617> endures forever.<WH5769>
Let the house<WH1004> of Aaron<WH175> now say<WH559> that his loving kindness<WH2617> endures forever.<WH5769>
Now let those who fear<WH3373> Yahweh<WH3068> say<WH559> that his loving kindness<WH2617> endures forever.<WH5769>
Out of my distress,<WH4712> I called<WH7121> on Yah.<WH3050> Yah<WH3050> answered<WH6030> me with freedom.<WH4800>
Yahweh<WH3068> is on my side.<WH3372> I will not be afraid. What can<WH6213> man<WH120> do to me?<WH6213>
Yahweh<WH3068> is on my side among those who help<WH5826> me.<WH7200> Therefore I will look in triumph at those who hate me.<WH8130>
It is better<WH2896> to take refuge<WH2620> in Yahweh,<WH3068> than to put confidence<WH982> in man.<WH120>
It is better<WH2896> to take refuge<WH2620> in Yahweh,<WH3068> than to put confidence<WH982> in princes.<WH5081>
All the nations<WH1471> surrounded<WH5437> me,<WH8034> but in the name of Yahweh,<WH3068> I cut them off.<WH4135>
They surrounded<WH5437> me,<WH5437> yes, they surrounded me.<WH8034> In the name of Yahweh<WH3068> I indeed cut them off.<WH4135>
They surrounded<WH5437> me like bees.<WH1682> They are quenched<WH1846> like the burning<WH784> thorns.<WH6975> In the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> I cut them off.<WH4135>
You pushed<WH1760> me back hard,<WH1760> to make me fall,<WH5307> but Yahweh<WH3068> helped me.<WH5826>
Yah<WH3050> is my strength<WH5797> and song.<WH2176> He has become my salvation.<WH3444>
The voice<WH6963> of rejoicing<WH7440> and salvation<WH3444> is in the tents<WH168> of the righteous.<WH6662> "The right hand<WH3225> of Yahweh<WH3068> does<WH6213> valiantly.<WH2428>
The right hand<WH3225> of Yahweh<WH3068> is exalted!<WH7426> The right hand<WH3225> of Yahweh<WH3068> does<WH6213> valiantly!<WH2428>"
I will not die,<WH4191> but live,<WH2421> and declare<WH5608> Yah<WH3050>'s works.<WH4639>
Yah<WH3050> has punished<WH3256> me severely,<WH3256> but he has not given me over<WH5414> to death.<WH4194>
Open<WH6605> to me the gates<WH8179> of righteousness.<WH6664> I will enter<WH935> into them.<WH3034> I will give thanks to Yah.<WH3050>
This is the gate<WH8179> of Yahweh;<WH3068> the righteous<WH6662> will enter into it.<WH935>
I will give thanks<WH3034> to you,<WH6030> for you have answered me,<WH3444> and have become my salvation.
The stone<WH68> which the builders<WH1129> rejected<WH3988> has become the head<WH7218> of the corner.<WH6438>
This is Yahweh<WH3068>'s doing.<WH6381> It is marvelous in our eyes.<WH5869>
This is the day<WH3117> that Yahweh<WH3068> has made.<WH6213> We will rejoice<WH1523> and be glad in it!<WH8055>
Save<WH3467> us now,<WH577> we beg you,<WH3068> Yahweh! Yahweh,<WH3068> we beg<WH577> you,<WH6743> send prosperity now.
Blessed<WH1288> is he who comes<WH935> in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh!<WH3068> We have blessed<WH1288> you out of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Yahweh<WH3068> is God,<WH410> and he has given us light.<WH215> Bind<WH631> the sacrifice<WH2282> with cords,<WH5688> even to the horns<WH7161> of the altar.<WH4196>
You are my God,<WH410> and I will give thanks<WH3034> to you.<WH430> You are my God, I will exalt you.<WH7311>
Oh give thanks<WH3034> to Yahweh,<WH3068> for he is good,<WH2896> for his loving kindness<WH2896> endures forever.<WH5769>
